mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, project_name as projectName, project_content as projectContent, created_by as createdBy, creation_date as creationDate, last_updated_by as lastUpdateBy, last_update_date as lastUpdateDate FROM project_info;
mapper.insert: insert into project_info (id, user_id, project_name, project_content, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastUpdateDate})
